text: Harallamb Qaqi (born 17 September 1993), is an Albanian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Alki Oroklini in Cyprus. ==Club career== ===Early career=== Kiakis started his youth career at AEK Athens, played some years and in 2012 he moved to Varese, where he stayed for a year. ===Verona=== On 26 July 2013 he moved to Hellas Verona and quickly loaned to Carpi until the end of the 2013–14 season.KIAKIS PER LA DIFESA « Sito Ufficiale del Carpi F.C. 1909 ====Carpi (on loan)==== He included in the first team of Carpi for the match against Ternana, played on 24 August 2013 where Kiakis was an unused substitute for the entire match, which finished in the 1–0 loss.Ternana vs. Carpi - 24 August 2013 - Soccerway He made it his first professional debut with Carpi on 30 May 2014 in the closing match of the 2013–14 Serie B against Juve Stabia by coming on as a substitute in the 90+1' minute in place of Roberto Inglese, the scorer of the opening goal of the match which finished as a 0–2 victory in the end.Juve Stabia vs. Carpi - 30 May 2014 - Soccerway ====Barleta (on loan)==== He loaned out to Barletta in Lega Pro Prima Divisione for the 2014–15 season. He made it his debut on 1 November 2014 by playing as a starter and finishing the full 90-minutes match between Barletta and Paganese which finished as a 2–1 loss where Kiakis scored an own-goal in the 83rd minute.Paganese vs. Barletta - 1 November 2014 - Soccerway ===Alki Oroklini=== On 30 August 2019, Qaqi joined Cypriot club Alki Oroklini.Το Δ.Σ. της ομάδας μας ανακοινώνει την έναρξη συμφωνίας με τον ποδοσφαιριστή Χαράλαμπο Κιάκη, facebook.com, 30 August 2019 ==International career== He started his international career with the youth national team Albania U-19, where he first called up in the team to participate in the 2012 UEFA European Under-19 Championship qualification, playing his first match on 5 October 2011 as the starter against Denmark U-19, where he substituted off in the 72nd minute and the match finished in the loss 1–0 with an later goal of Denmark U-19 scored in the 90+3rd minute.Denmark U19 vs. Albania U19 - 5 October 2011 - Soccerway He played two days later in the next fixture match against Austria U-19, where he included again in the starting line up and received a yellow card in the 64th minute, then the second yellow card in the 71st so he was sent off, and the match finished in a goalless draw 0–0.Austria U19 vs. Albania U19 - 7 October 2011 - Soccerway After being played for Albania U-19, Kiakis received an call-up by the coach Skënder Gega for the Albania national under-21 football team fixture matches against Hungary U-21 and Bosnia and Herzegovina U-21 respectively on 7 and 11 June 2013, valids for the 2015 UEFA European Under-21 Football Championship qualification. He was an unused substitute for the first match against Hungary U-21, which finished in the 1–2 loss.Albania U21 vs. Hungary U21 - 7 June 2013 - Soccerway He made it his debut in the fixture match against Bosnia and Herzegovina U-21 on 11 June 2013, as he included in the starting line up then substituted off for the start of the second half, as the match finished in the 4–1 loss.Bosnia- Herzegovina U21 vs. Albania U21 - 11 June 2013 - Soccerway ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Season !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|League country !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|League Cup !colspan="2"|Europe !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="1"|2013–14||rowspan="1" valign="center"|Carpi||rowspan="1"| Serie B ||1||0||0||0||-||-||1||0 |- |- !colspan="3" valign="center"|Total !1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0 |- |rowspan="1"|2014–15||rowspan="1" valign="center"|Barletta||rowspan="1"|Lega Pro Prima Divisione ||1||0||0||0||-||-||1||0 |- |- !colspan="3" valign="center"|Total !1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0 |- |- !colspan="3"|Career total !2!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!2!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * * *Profile - FSHF Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Tirana Category:Association football central defenders Category:Albanian footballers Category:Albania youth international footballers Category:Albania under-21 international footballers Category:Hellas Verona F.C. players Category:Carpi F.C. 1909 players Category:A.S.D.
